search_for_article.name: search_for_article
search_for_article.description: Use the '/tools/bing/searchv2' API to search for the article about 'Food For Everyone' by an author who has studied the distribution of rare and elusive species illustrated by the Kam dwarf hamster.

load_article_content.name: load_article_content
load_article_content.description: Use the '/tools/bing/load_pagev2' API with a query parameter set to the title of the article found in the previous step to load the content of the article.

extract_genus_from_article.name: extract_genus_from_article
extract_genus_from_article.description: Analyze the content returned by the previous task to extract the genus being studied in the article about 'Food For Everyone'.

search_for_wikispecies_subordo.name: search_for_wikispecies_subordo
search_for_wikispecies_subordo.description: Use the '/tools/bing/searchv2' API to search for the Wikispecies Subordo of the genus identified in the previous step as of 2022.

load_wikispecies_subordo_content.name: load_wikispecies_subordo_content
load_wikispecies_subordo_content.description: Use the '/tools/bing/load_pagev2' API with a query parameter set to the genus name and 'Wikispecies Subordo 2022' to find the most relevant content about the Subordo.

extract_subordo_information.name: extract_subordo_information
extract_subordo_information.description: Analyze the content returned by the previous task to extract the Wikispecies Subordo for the identified genus as of 2022.
